interests.hint: You can change this anytime in settings
interests.title: Could you tell me what areas you're interested in?
interests.title2: This will help me get a first impression of you~
interests.title3: Take your time, I'll get to know you better and better

modeSelection.desc: Choose the mode that suits you best
modeSelection.hint: You can change this anytime in settings

lite.desc: Ideal for everyday conversations, Q&A, light productivity, and trying out models
lite.subtitle: Lightweight and focused—perfect for efficient collaboration with a single all-in-one assistant. Switch between popular models anytime to stay in your best thinking state.
lite.title: Lite

pro.desc: Designed for workflow-oriented users seeking deep collaboration and customization
pro.subtitle: Professional productivity mode. Run a one-person company, collaborate with multiple assistants, and deeply customize models and workflows to build your own intelligent hub.
pro.title: Pro

modeSelection.title: Which work mode do you prefer?
modeSelection.title3: Tell me, so I can tailor it just for you~

model.title: Default Model Used by the Agent

proSettings.title: Configure Advanced Options in Advance
proSettings.title3: Let's Get Ready for Efficient Work!

responseLanguage.desc: Choose the language AI assistant will use when replying to messages
responseLanguage.hint: After selecting a language, AI responses will use that language, and the interface language will also sync
responseLanguage.title: Which language should we use to communicate?
responseLanguage.title2: Start with language, build true understanding.
responseLanguage.title3: Let me speak clearly and understand you better~

telemetry.agreement: All data collected is anonymous and used solely to improve the product experience. By continuing, you confirm that you understand and agree to the <terms>Terms and Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.
telemetry.desc: I'm your AI assistant and companion, here to help you think, create, and manage your team of Agents anytime.

collaborate.desc: Here, people and Agents work, learn, and evolve together—letting productivity flow naturally.
collaborate.title: Collaborate · Evolve with Intelligence

create.desc: From idea to action. Just think it, and your Agent is born.
create.title: Create · Turn Inspiration into Reality

evolve.desc: Every interaction helps me understand you better—not just in response, but in comprehension.
evolve.title: Evolve · The More You Use, the Better I Know You

privacy.desc: We use anonymized data to continuously improve the {{appName}} experience. Of course, you can adjust this setting anytime in your privacy preferences.
privacy.title: Let's Make {{appName}} Even Better Together

telemetry.title: Hey there, I'm {{name}}

username.desc: Tell us what we should call you
username.hint: You can change this anytime in settings
username.title: By the way, what should I call you?
username.title2: Let’s get to know each other first!
username.title3: That way, we can chat more naturally from now on~
